doc: ['Partial least-squares regression for linking land-cover pattern to soil erosion and sediment yield in watershed .', 'There are strong tie between land cover pattern and soil erosion and sediment yield in watershed .', 'The spatial configuration of land cover has recently become an important aspect of the study of geomorphological process related to erosion within watershed .', 'Many study have used multivariate regression technique to explore the response of soil erosion and sediment yield to land cover pattern in watershed .', 'However , many landscape metric are highly correlated and may result in redundancy , which violates the assumption of a traditional least-squares approach , thus leading to singular solution or otherwise biased parameter estimate and confidence interval .', 'Here , we investigated the landscape pattern within watershed in the Upper Du River watershed ( 8973km2 ) in China and examined how the spatial pattern of land cover are related to the soil erosion and sediment yield of watershed using hydrological modeling and partial least-squares regression ( PLSR ) .', 'The result indicate that the watershed soil erosion and sediment yield are closely associated with the land cover pattern .', "At the landscape level , landscape characteristic , such as Shannon 's diversity index ( SHDI ) , aggregation index ( AI ) , largest patch index ( LPI ) , contagion ( CONTAG ) , and patch cohesion index ( COHESION ) , were identified as the primary metric controlling the watershed soil erosion and sediment yield .", 'The landscape characteristic in watershed could account for as much as 65 % and 74 % of the variation in soil erosion and sediment yield , respectively .', 'Greater interspersion and an increased number of patch land cover type may significantly accelerate soilerosion and increase sediment export .', 'PLSR can be used to simply determine the relationship between land-cover pattern and watershed soil erosion and sediment yield , providing quantitative information to allow decision maker to make better choice regarding landscape planning .', 'With readily available remote sensing data and rapid development in geographic information system ( GIS ) technology , this practical and simple PLSR approach could be applied to a variety of other watershed .', 'Urban flood risk mapping using the GARP and QUEST model : A comparative study of machine learning technique .', 'Flood risk mapping and modeling is important to prevent urban flood damage .', 'In this study , a flood risk map was produced with limited hydrological and hydraulic data using two state-of-the-art machine learning model : Genetic Algorithm Rule-Set Production ( GARP ) and Quick Unbiased Efficient Statistical Tree ( QUEST ) .', 'The flood conditioning factor used in modeling were : precipitation , slope , curve number , distance to river , distance to channel , depth to groundwater , land use , and elevation .', 'Based on available report and field survey for Sari city ( Iran ) , 113 point were identified as flooded area ( with each flooded zone assigned a value of 1 ) .', 'Different conditioning factor , including urban density , quality of building , age of building , population density , and socio-economic condition , were taken into account to analyze flood vulnerability .', 'In addition , the weight of these conditioning factor was determined based on expert knowledge and Fuzzy Analytical Network Process ( FANP ) .', 'An urban flood risk map was then produced using flood hazard and flood vulnerability map .', 'The area under the receiver-operator characteristic curve ( AUC-ROC ) and Kappa statistic were applied to evaluate model performance .', 'The result demonstrated that the GARP model ( AUC-ROC = 93.5 % , Kappa = 0.86 ) had higher performance accuracy than the QUEST model ( AUC-ROC = 89.2 % , Kappa = 0.79 ) .', 'The result also indicated that distance to channel , land use , and elevation played major role in flood hazard determination , whereas population density , quality of building , and urban density were the most important factor in term of vulnerability .', 'These finding demonstrate that machine learning model can help in flood risk mapping , especially in area where detailed hydraulic and hydrological data are not available .', 'A data-driven predictive model of city-scale energy use in building .', 'Many city across the United States have turned to building energy disclosure ( or benchmarking ) law to encourage transparency in energy efficiency market and to support sustainability and carbon reduction plan .', 'In addition to direct peer-to-peer comparison , the benchmarking data published under these law have been used as a tool by researcher and policy-makers to study the distribution and determinant of energy use in large building .', 'However , these policy only cover a small subset of the building stock in a given city , and thus capture only a fraction of energy use at the urban scale .', 'To overcome this limitation , we develop a predictive model of energy use at the building , district , and city scale using training data from energy disclosure policy and predictor from widely-available property and zoning information .', 'We use statistical model to predict the energy use of 1.1 million building in New York City using the physical , spatial , and energy use attribute of a subset derived from 23,000 building required to report energy use data each year .', "Linear regression ( OLS ) , random forest , and support vector regression ( SVM ) algorithms are fit to the city 's energy benchmarking data and then used to predict electricity and natural gas use for every property in the city .", 'Model accuracy is assessed and validated at the building level and zip code level using actual consumption data from calendar year 2014 .', 'We find the OLS model performs best when generalizing to the City as a whole , and SVM result in the lowest mean absolute error for predicting energy use within the LL84 sample .', 'Our median predicted electric energy use intensity for office building is 71.2 kbtu/sf and for residential building is 31.2 kbtu/sf with mean absolute log accuracy ratio of 0.17 .', 'Building age is found to be a significant predictor of energy use , with newer building ( particularly those built since 1991 ) found to have higher consumption level than those constructed before 1930 .', 'We also find higher electric consumption in office and retail building , although the sign is reversed for natural gas .', 'In general , larger building use less energy per square foot , while taller building with more story , controlling for floor area , use more energy per square foot .', 'Attached building – those with adjacent building and a shared party wall – are found to have lower natural gas use intensity .', 'The result demonstrate that electricity consumption can be reliably predicted using actual data from a relatively small subset of building , while natural gas use presents a more complicated problem given the bimodal distribution of consumption and infrastructure availability .', 'Simulating land-use dynamic under planning policy by integrating artificial immune system with cellular automaton .', 'Cellular automata ( CA ) have been increasingly used in simulating urban expansion and land-use dynamic .', 'However , most urban CA model rely on empirical data for deriving transition rule , assuming that the historical trend will continue into the future .', 'Such inertia CA model do not take into account possible external intervention , particularly planning policy , and thus have rarely been used in urban and land-use planning .', 'This paper proposes to use artificial immune system ( AIS ) as a technique for incorporating external intervention and generating alternative in urban simulation .', "Inspired by biological immune system , the primary process of AIS is the evolution of a set of 'antibodies ' that are capable of learning through interaction with a set of sample 'antigens ' .", "These 'antibodies ' finally get 'matured ' and can be used to identify/classify other 'antigens ' .", "An AIS-based CA model incorporates planning policy by altering the evolution mechanism of the 'antibodies ' .", "Such a model is capable of generating different scenario of urban development under different land-use policy , with which the planner will be able to answer 'what if ' question and to evaluate different option .", 'We applied an AIS-based CA model to the simulation of urban agglomeration development in the Pearl River Delta in southern China .', 'Our experiment demonstrate that the proposed model can be very useful in exploring various planning scenario of urban development .', 'Urbanization impact on landscape pattern in Beijing City , China : A spatial heterogeneity perspective .', 'The temporal and spatial characteristic of landscape pattern change can reflect the spatial impact of urbanization on the ecological environment .', 'Studying the relationship between urbanization and landscape pattern can provide support for urban ecological management .', 'Previous study have examined the quantitative relationship between the social economy and landscape pattern of an entire region , but have not considered the spatial non-stability of this relationship .', 'In this study , we characterized the landscape pattern in Beijing City , China during 2000 and 2010 using four landscape metric , i.e .', "patch density ( PD ) , edge density ( ED ) , Shannon 's diversity index ( SHDI ) and the aggregation index ( AI ) .", 'Geographically weighted regression ( GWR ) was employed to identify the spatial heterogeneity and evolution characteristic of the relationship between the urbanization of population density ( POP ) , gross domestic production ( GDP ) and nighttime lighting ( NTL ) , and landscape pattern .', 'The evolution of urban landscape pattern indicated a decentralized , aggregated , and fragmented change from the downtown to the suburb and outer suburb .', 'During the 10-year period , the average PD in the downtown increased by 100.6 % , and the increase of AI in the suburb was the largest .', 'The PD , ED and SHDI increased by different degree in the outer suburb .', 'The influence of different urbanization mode on landscape pattern were also different .', 'Infilling mode made the landscape patterns more regular and integrated .', 'The landscape was more broken and complicated under the edge-expanding mode , and the leapfrog mode made PD and SHDI increase slightly .', 'In the relationship interpretation , GWR effectively identified the spatial heterogeneity , and improved the explanatory ability compared to ordinary least square ( OLS ) .', 'The most intense response to urbanization was the forest landscape and the forest-cultivated land ecotone in the northwest of Beijing City , indicating that this region was ecologically fragile .', 'The population density in the urbanization index had a direct effect on landscape pattern , while the PD affected by urbanization was greater than the shape , aggregation and diversity index .', 'Affected by development policy , urban planning and other factor , the explanation degree of social economy to landscape pattern decreased in 2010 .', 'GWR is an effective method for quantifying the spatial differentiation characteristic of urbanization impact on landscape pattern , which can provide more spatial information and decision criterion for the green development of a compact city .', 'Using image recognition to automate assessment of cultural ecosystem service from social medium photographs .', 'Quantifying and mapping cultural ecosystem service is complex because of their intangibility .', 'Data from social medium , such as geo-tagged photographs , have been proposed for mapping cultural use or appreciation of ecosystem .', 'However , manual content analysis and classification of large number of photographs is time consuming .', 'This study develops a novel method for automating content analysis of social medium photographs for ecosystem service assessment .', 'The approach applies an online machine learning algorithm – Google Cloud Vision – to analyse over 20,000 photograph from Singapore , and uses hierarchical clustering to group these photograph .', 'The accuracy of the classification was assessed by comparison with manual classification .', 'Over 20 % of photographs were taken of nature , being of animal or plant .', 'The distribution of nature photographs was concentrated around particular natural attraction , and nature photographs were more likely to occur in park and area of high vegetation cover .', 'The approach developed for clustering photographs was accurate and saved approximately 170 h of manual work .', 'The method provides an indicator of cultural ecosystem service that can be applied rapidly over large area .', 'Automated assessment and mapping of cultural ecosystem service could be used to inform urban planning .', 'Artificial intelligence solution for urban land dynamic : A review .', 'Artificial intelligence ( AI ) system are widely accepted as a technology offering an alternative way to tackle complex and dynamic problem in urban study .', 'The goal of this article is a review of current literature in the field of planning and AI .', 'The aim of this review is to increase the understanding of how AI approaches urban and land dynamic modeling process and how , as a result , researcher can structure that knowledge and choose the correct approaches to embed in their model .', 'For this purpose , the author review the application of AI technique in urban land dynamic domain as well as the emerging challenge they face .', 'The author discuss hybrid AI system as a need resulting from the trend in planning policy to develop more holistic approach .', 'The author conclude that , although challenge exist , AI-based approach offer promising solution for urban and land dynamic .', 'Integrating the multi-label land-use concept and cellular automata with the artificial neural network-based Land Transformation Model : an integrated ML-CA-LTM modeling framework .', 'Cellular automata ( CA ) and artificial neural network ( ANNs ) have been used by researcher over the last three decade to simulate land-use change ( LUC ) .', 'While conventional CA and ANN model assign a cell to only one land-use class , in reality , a cell may belong to several land-use class simultaneously .', 'The recently developed multi-label ( ML ) concept overcomes this limitation in land change science .', 'Although the ML concept is a new paradigm with nonexclusive class and has shown considerable merit in several application , few study in land change science have applied it .', 'In addition , determining transition rule in conventional CA is difficult when the number of driver is large .', 'Since CA has been shown as a potential model to consider neighborhood effect and ANN has been shown effective in determining CA transition rule , we integrated both CA with an ANN model to overcome limitation of each tool .', 'In this study , we specifically extended the ANN-based Land Transformation Model ( LTM ) with both a CA-based model and the ML concept to create an integrated ML-CA-LTM modeling framework .', 'We also compared , using standard evaluation measure , difference between the proposed integrated model with a conventional CA-based LTM model ( called the ml-CA-LTM ) .', 'Parameterization was made using a learning and testing procedure common in machine learning .', 'Result showed that the modified LUC model , ML-CA-LTM , produced consistently better goodness of fit calibration value compared to the ml-CA-LTM .', 'The outcome of this modified model can be used by manager and decision maker for improved urban planning .', 'Artificial intelligence technology for robot assisted urban search and rescue .', 'Structural collapse disaster routinely inspire sympathy not only for victim and their family , but also for heroic rescue personnel who are faced with a tremendously complex , hazardous and often frustrating task environment .', 'Military operation and rescue activity in the aftermath of recent earthquake and bombing indicate a tremendous need for greater access to denied area within any crisis site involving collapsed structure .', 'Recent development in the remote inspection industry show great potential for employment of small robotic micro-rover system in expanded role for Urban Search and Rescue .', 'This paper discusses key issue in the application of robotic system to Urban Search and Rescue ( USAR ) activity and discus ongoing development of a knowledge-based system for efficient management of automated search asset .', "USAR modeling and `` micro-bot '' employment advantage are addressed first , followed by a discussion of numerical method shortcoming in the context of search asset allocation .", 'KNOBSAR is then proposed as an initial expert system prototype designed to interact with various structural collapse simulation package and provide advice on search asset allocation to specific entry point within a crisis site .', 'KNOBSAR structure and design is then illustrated in term of micro-bot allocation scenario to various collapsed structure entry point .', 'The conclusion drawn from literature review , experimentation and personal experience is that AI technology in the form of robotic platform and decision support tool can have a tremendous impact on overall search efficiency for the USAR community , and represent an important field of study for related military application .', 'Urban water resource management for sustainable environment planning using artificial intelligence technique .', 'In the current era , water is a significant resource for socio-economic growth and the protection of healthy environment .', 'Properly controlled water resource are considered a vital part of development , which reduces poverty and equity .', 'Conventional Water system Management maximizes the existing water flows available to satisfy all competing demand , including on-site water and groundwater .', 'Therefore , Climatic change would intensify the specific challenge in water resource management by contributing to uncertainty .', "Sustainable water resource management is an essential process for ensuring the earth 's life and the future .", 'Nonlinear effect , stochastic dynamic , and hydraulic constraint are challenging in ecological planning for sustainable water development .', "In this paper , Adaptive Intelligent Dynamic Water Resource Planning ( AIDWRP ) has been proposed to sustain the urban area ' water environment .", 'Here , an adaptive intelligent approach is a subset of the Artificial Intelligence ( AI ) technique in which environmental planning for sustainable water development has been modeled effectively .', 'Artificial intelligence modeling improves water efficiency by transforming information into a leaner process , improving decision-making based on data-driven by combining numeric AI tool and human intellectual skill .', 'In AIDWRP , Markov Decision Process ( MDP ) discusses the dynamic water resource management issue with annual use and released locational constraint that develop sensitivity-driven method to optimize several efficient environmental planning and management policy .', 'Consequently , there is a specific relief from the engagement of supply and demand for water resource , and substantial improvement in local economic efficiency have been simulated with numerical outcome .', 'Mapping urban form and function at city block level using spatial metric .', 'This paper focuses on the potential of urban metric describing the presence and the configuration of built-up and open space area for mapping distinct type of urban form and function at city block level .', "Next to traditional , patch-based metric used in landscape ecology , alternative metric are proposed , measuring the presence and the spatial arrangement of built-up and open space area along a set of radial transects , along contour parallel to the urban block boundary and along the block 's perimeter , as well as metric describing the internal composition of the built-up area .", 'Use of the proposed metric for identifying different type of urban form and function was tested on the Brussels Capital Region .', 'Large-scale vector data was used to define built-up structure and to analyse the morphological property of the built-up area at block level .', 'Decision tree classification was applied in conjunction with bootstrap aggregation to gain insight in the distinctive character of the defined metric , and the robustness of land use and urban form classification based on these metric .', 'Our study point out the shortcoming of traditional landscape ecological metric for mapping urban form and emphasizes the need for alternative approach for analysing urban landscape , more explicitly describing the morphological characteristic of the urban fabric .', 'Turning down the heat : An enhanced understanding of the relationship between urban vegetation and surface temperature at the city scale .', 'Guiding urban planner on the cooling return of different configuration of urban vegetation is important to protect urban dweller from adverse heat impact .', 'To this end , we estimated statistical model that fused multi-temporal very fine spatial ( 20 cm ) and vertical ( 1 mm ) resolution imagery , that captures the complexity of urban vegetation , with remotely sensed temperature data to assess how urban vegetation configuration influence urban temperature .', 'Perth , Western Australia , was used as a case-study for this analysis .', 'Panel regression model showed that within a location an increase in tree and shrub cover has a larger cooling effect than grass coverage .', 'On average , holding all else equal , an approximate 1 km 2 increase in shrub ( tree ) cover within a location reduces surface temperature by 12 °c ( 5 °C ) .', 'We included a range of robustness check for the observed relationship between urban vegetation type and temperature .', 'Geographically weighted regression model showed spatial variation in the cooling effect of different vegetation type ; this indicates that i ) unobserved factor moderate temperature-vegetation relationship across urban landscape , and ii ) that urban vegetation type and temperature relationship are complex .', 'Machine learning model ( Random Forest ) were used to further explore complex and non-linear relationship between different urban vegetation configuration and temperature .', 'The Random Forests showed that vegetation type explained 31.84 % of the out-of-bag variance in summer surface temperature , that increased cover of large vegetation within a location increases cooling , and that different configuration of urban vegetation structure can lead to cooling gain .', 'The model in this study were trained with vegetation data capturing local detail , multiple time-periods , and entire city coverage .', 'Thus , these model illustrate the potential to develop locally-detailed and spatially explicit tool to guide planning of vegetation configuration to optimise cooling at local- and city-scales .', 'Scale- and region-dependence in landscape-PM2.5 correlation : Implication for urban planning .', 'Under rapid urbanization , many city in China suffer from serious fine particulate matter ( PMPM2.5 ) pollution .', 'As the emission source or adsorption sink , land use and the corresponding landscape pattern unavoidably affect the concentration .', 'However , the correlation varies with different region and scale , leaving a significant gap for urban planning .', 'This study clarifies the correlation with the aid of in situ and satellite-based spatial datasets over six urban agglomeration in China .', 'Two coverage and four landscape index are adopted to represent land use and landscape pattern .', 'Specifically , the coverage index include the area ratio of forest ( F_PLAND ) and built-up area ( C_PLAND ) .', "The landscape index refer to the perimeter-area fractal dimension index ( PAFRAC ) , interspersion and juxtaposition index ( IJI ) , aggregation index ( AI ) , Shannon 's diversity index ( SHDI ) .", 'Then , the correlation between PMPM2.5 concentration with the selected index are evaluated from supporting the potential urban planning .', 'Result show that the correlation are weak with the in situ PMPM2.5 concentration , which are significant with the regional value .', 'It means that land use coverage and landscape pattern affect PMPM2.5 at a relatively large scale .', 'Furthermore , regional PMPM2.5 concentration negatively correlate to F_PLAND and positively to C_PLAND ( significance at p & lt ; 0.05 ) , indicating that forest helps to improve air quality , while built-up area worsen the pollution .', 'Finally , the heterogeneous landscape present positive correlation to the regional PMPM2.5 concentration in most region , except for the urban agglomeration with highly-developed urban ( i.e.', ', the Jing-Jin-Ji and Chengdu-Chongqing urban agglomeration ) .', 'It suggests that centralized urbanization would be helpful for PMPM2.5 pollution controlling by reducing the emission source in most region .', 'Based on the result , the potential urban planning is proposed for controlling PMPM2.5 pollution for each urban agglomeration .', 'The effect of multi-dimensional indicator on urban thermal condition .', 'Urban heat island ( UHI ) study have recognized ten factor as increasing the inner-city temperature compared with that of the surrounding suburbs .', 'The UHI effect is a leading cause of heat-related disease and mortality in many nation .', 'However , there are still two main shortcoming .', 'First , the effect of UHI is not well recognized in arid and semi-arid region .', 'Second , the association of multi-dimensional information with surface temperature in urban area must be examined .', 'This study focuses on the height-related aspect of urban geometry in an arid region .', 'A range of multispectral and spatial vector data were used to derive the surface temperature and two-dimensional ( 2D ) and three-dimensional ( 3D ) information of the study area .', 'All information was aggregated into a grid with common spatial resolution to create a homogeneous dataset .', 'The machine learning statistical model of a boosted regression tree ( BRT ) was used to reflect the relative influence of 2D and 3D indicator with land surface temperature .', 'Our result showed a cooler surface temperature in the city than in the surrounding area , leading to the question of whether the established UHI definition encompasses all type of city .', 'In addition , the thermal band was able to distinguish different spatial structure in the study area .', 'The BRT analysis demonstrated that both multi-dimensional 2D and 3D indicator affect the surface temperature .', 'In particular , the 3D indicator play a more important role than 2D indicator in shaping the surface temperature at different urban geometry of the study area .', 'This new method can help urban planner identify the most influential 2D and 3D indicator that affect the surface temperature in different district of a city .', 'Forecasting smog-related health hazard based on social medium and physical sensor .', 'Smog disaster are becoming more and more frequent and may cause severe consequence on the environment and public health , especially in urban area .', 'Social medium as a real-time urban data source has become an increasingly effective channel to observe people׳s reaction on smog-related health hazard .', 'It can be used to capture possible smog-related public health disaster in its early stage .', 'We then propose a predictive analytic approach that utilizes both social medium and physical sensor data to forecast the next day smog-related health hazard .', 'First , we model smog-related health hazard and smog severity through mining raw microblogging text and network information diffusion data .', 'Second , we developed an artificial neural network ( ANN ) -based model to forecast smog-related health hazard with the current health hazard and smog severity observation .', 'We evaluate the performance of the approach with other alternative machine learning method .', 'To the best of our knowledge , we are the first to integrate social medium and physical sensor data for smog-related health hazard forecasting .', 'The empirical finding can help researcher to better understand the non-linear relationship between the current smog observation and the next day health hazard .', 'In addition , this forecasting approach can provide decision support for smog-related health hazard management through function like early warning .', 'Can expert system help with planning ?', '.', 'The study of urban information system has focused primarily on devising an effective way to integrate data from various source to provide the necessary information for decision making .', 'Recent advance in artificial intelligence ( AI ) technology have raised interest in how existing urban information system might benefit from AI .', 'Artificial intelligence does not solve urban planning problem by itself .', 'Rather , it is a newly emerging and promising technology that can be integrated into existing information system to provide more intelligent and effective solution to urban problem .', 'We conclude that application of expert system to urban planning are not only desirable but also a means of overcoming the limitation found in current computer-based approach to problem solving .', 'By integrating the technique of expert system into existing computer-based system , planner will be able to develop more intelligent information system for supporting their various task .', 'Mining transition rule of cellular automaton for simulating urban expansion by using the deep learning technique .', 'Along with the gradually accelerated urbanization process , simulating and predicting the future pattern of the city is of great importance to the prediction and prevention of some environmental , economic and urban issue .', 'Previous study have generally integrated traditional machine learning with cellular automaton ( CA ) model to simulate urban development .', 'Nevertheless , difficulty still exist in the process of obtaining more accurate result with CA model ; such difficulty are mainly due to the insufficient consideration of neighborhood effect during urban transition rule mining .', 'In this paper , we used an effective deep learning method , named convolution neural network for united mining ( UMCNN ) , to solve the problem .', 'UMCNN has substantial potential to get neighborhood information from its receptive field .', 'Thus , a novel CA model coupled with UMCNN and Markov chain was designed to improve the performance of simulating urban expansion process .', 'Choosing the Pearl River Delta of China as the study area , we excavate the driving factor and the transformational relation revealed by the urban land-use pattern in 2000 , 2005 and 2010 and further simulate the urban expansion status in 2020 and 2030 .', 'Additionally , three traditional machine-learning-based CA model ( LR , ANN and RFA ) are built to attest the practicality of the proposed model .', 'In the comparison , the proposed method reaches the highest simulation accuracy and landscape index similarity .', 'The predicted urban expansion result reveal that the economy will continue to be the primary factor in the study area from 2010 to 2030 .', 'The proposed model can serve as guidance in urban planning and government decision-making .', 'Impact of land use and amenity on public transport use , urban planning and design .', 'Various land-use configuration are known to have wide-ranging effect on the dynamic of and within other city component including the transportation system .', 'In this work , we particularly focus on the complex relationship between land-use and transport offering an innovative approach to the problem by using land-use feature at two differing level of granularity ( the more general land-use sector type and the more granular amenity structure ) to evaluate their impact on public transit ridership in both time and space .', "To quantify the interdependency , we explored three machine learning model and demonstrate that the decision tree model performs best in term of overall performance-good predictive accuracy , generality , computational efficiency , and `` interpretability '' .", 'Result also reveal that amenity-related feature are better predictor than the more general one , which suggests that high-resolution geo-information can provide more insight into the dependence of transit ridership on land-use .', "We then demonstrate how the developed framework can be applied to urban planning for transit-oriented development by exploring practicable scenario based on Singapore 's urban plan toward 2030 , which includes the development of `` regional center '' ( RCs ) across the city-state .", 'Results show an initial increase in transit ridership as the amount of amenity is increased .', 'This trend , on the other hand , eventually reverses ( particularly during peak hour ) with continued strategic increase in amenity ; a tipping point at 55 % increase is identified where ridership begins to decline and at 110 % , the predicted ridership begins to fall below current level .', 'Our in-silico experiment support one of the medium-term land-use transport goal of stakeholders-to alleviate future strain in the transportation system of Singapore through the development of RCs .', 'The model put forward can serve as a good foundation in building decision-support tool that can assist planner in better strategizing and planning land-use configuration , in particular the amenity resource distribution , to influence and shape public transportation demand .', 'Upscaling urban data science for global climate solution .', 'Non-technical summary Manhattan , Berlin and New Delhi all need to take action to adapt to climate change and to reduce greenhouse gas emission .', 'While case study on these city provide valuable insight , comparability and scalability remain sidelined .', 'It is therefore timely to review the state-of-the-art in data infrastructure , including earth observation , social medium data , and how they could be better integrated to advance climate change science in city and urban area .', 'We present three route for expanding knowledge on global urban area : mainstreaming data collection , amplifying the use of big data and taking further advantage of computational method to analyse qualitative data to gain new insight .', 'These data-based approach have the potential to upscale urban climate solution and effect change at the global scale .', 'Technical summary City have an increasingly integral role in addressing climate change .', 'To gain a common understanding of solution , we require adequate and representative data of urban area , including data on related greenhouse gas emission , climate threat and of socio-economic contexts .', 'Here , we review the current state of urban data science in the context of climate change , investigating the contribution of urban metabolism study , remote sensing , big data approach , urban economics , urban climate and weather study .', 'We outline three route for upscaling urban data science for global climate solution : 1 ) Mainstreaming and harmonizing data collection in city worldwide ; 2 ) Exploiting big data and machine learning to scale solution while maintaining privacy ; 3 ) Applying computational technique and data science method to analyse published qualitative information for the systematization and understanding of first-order climate effect and solution .', 'Collaborative effort towards a joint data platform and integrated urban service would provide the quantitative foundation of the emerging global urban sustainability science .', 'A human-machine adversarial scoring framework for urban perception assessment using street-view image .', 'Though global-coverage urban perception datasets have been recently created using machine learning , their efficacy in accurately assessing local urban perception for other country and region remains a problem .', 'Here we describe a human-machine adversarial scoring framework using a methodology that incorporates deep learning and iterative feedback with recommendation score , which allows for the rapid and cost-effective assessment of the local urban perception for Chinese city .', 'Using the state-of-the-art Fully Convolutional Network ( FCN ) and Random Forest ( RF ) algorithms , the proposed method provides perception estimation with error less than 10 % .', 'The driving factor analysis from both the visual and urban functional aspect demonstrated its feasibility in facilitating local urban perception derivation .', 'With high-throughput and high-accuracy scoring , the proposed human-machine adversarial framework offer an affordable and rapid solution for urban planner and researcher to conduct local urban perception assessment .', 'Microsite condition dominate habitat selection of the red mason bee ( Osmia bicornis , Hymenoptera : Megachilidae ) in an urban environment : A case study from Leipzig , Germany .', 'The red mason bee ( Osmia bicornis L. ) is a common wild bee in urban environment which contributes to early-season pollination .', 'We know only little about how any specie of wild bee in city responds to resource distribution or landscape structure and the urban habitat ( s ) that they prefer .', 'We employed a citizen science approach to investigate driver behind the spatial distribution of this solitary bee in the urban region of Leipzig ( Germany ) .', 'Volunteer hung trap nest at different location and collected information on eight local , microsite condition ( such as sun exposure , attachment position , local flower availability ) .', 'We derived 14 landscape factor from a digital GIS biotope data map ( e.g .', 'distance to flower site and urban matrix property such as size and edge length of patch ) .', 'Both occurrence and abundance of O. bicornis were then analyzed using a combination of machine learning and multiple ( logistic ) regression .', 'The result indicate that the red mason bee is ubiquitous in urban area but clearly profit from nearby floral resource .', 'Although we expected a balanced influence of landscape factor and microsite condition , we found that hang location of the trap nest was most important , followed by sun exposure .', 'City with many fine-scaled floral resource ( such as private garden but not park ) and an open housing structure with higher sun exposure between building provide a good environment for cavity-nesting bee such as O. bicornis .', 'In place without suitable nesting opportunity , artificial nest can support the bee .', 'Spatial prediction of landslide susceptibility using GIS-based statistical and machine learning model in Wanzhou County , Three Gorges Reservoir , China .', 'Landslide susceptibility mapping is vital for landslide risk management and urban planning .', 'In this study , we used three statistical model [ frequency ratio , certainty factor and index of entropy ( IOE ) ] and a machine learning model [ random forest ( RF ) ] for landslide susceptibility mapping in Wanzhou County , China .', 'First , a landslide inventory map was prepared using earlier geotechnical investigation report , aerial image , and field survey .', 'Then , the redundant factor were excluded from the initial fourteen landslide causal factor via factor correlation analysis .', 'To determine the most effective causal factor , landslide
